channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: De Nuded: Broadcasters Association Yanks Award for Robert De Niro After Unhinged Rant Outside Courthouse
'Very pleased': Trump's guilty verdict ignites mixed reactions outside NYC courtroom
item.description: Fox News Digital interviewed several people outside a New York City courtroom moments after former President Trump was found guilty on all charges against him.

item.title: Legal Experts to Newsmax: Something 'Fishy' in Quick Fraud Verdict Against Trump
item.description: The fraud conviction of former President Donald Trump was "fishy" coming so quickly after deliberations began Wednesday - and because of a "biased" judge who failed to "do anything the right way," legal experts told Newsmax.

item.title: GHOULS: Biden Team Cheers As Verdicts Read, Hillary Grins Like the Cat Who Just Swallowed a Hummingbird
2024 Showdown: Trump and Biden quickly cash in on former president's guilty verdicts
item.description: The campaigns of President Biden and former President Trump quickly cashed in on the guilty verdicts in Trump's criminal trial for their 2024 election rematch.

item.title: Joseph diGenova to Newsmax: Judge in N.Y. Case Got Verdict He Wanted
item.description: The judge in the New York trial against Donald Trump got exactly the verdict he wanted, former U.S. Attorney Joseph diGenova told Newsmax on Thursday.

item.title: Silicon Valley Tech Mogul Responds to Trump Verdict With Whopping $300K Donation
'Salute me or shoot me': Venezuelan gang members sneaking into US pose 'serious threat'
item.description: A number of illegal immigrants affiliated with the Venezuelan gang Tren de Aragua were nabbed in Texas this week, according to the top U.S. border official.

item.title: Democrats React to Verdict: 'Justice Arrived for Trump'
item.description: Reaction from Democrats on the guilty verdict rendered against former President Donald Trump on Thursday ranged from flippant and overjoyed to sober.

item.title: Asa Hutchinson's Republican Mask Slips to Show the Leftist Underneath After Trump Verdict
First on Fox: Calls for State Department to abandon 'obsession' with DEI and 'depoliticize,' new report says
item.description: The Heritage Foundation urged the State Department to dismantle it's Office of Diversity and Inclusion and to prioritize standardized testing as a means of determining qualified candidates.

item.title: Trump's Donation Website Crashes After Guilty Verdict
item.description: The donation website for Republican presumptive presidential nominee Donald Trump crashed from a wave of traffic moments after Thursday's guilty verdict against him in New York was announced, Trump's campaign said.

item.title: RFK Jr.'s Reaction to Trump Conviction? 'You Can't Save Democracy by Destroying It First'
Trump campaign warns Biden to 'buckle up' after he's released from 'freezing' court to hit campaign trail
item.description: Former President Trump is thrilled to be out of a â€œfreezing" New York City courtroom after a six-week trial and is ready to hit the campaign trail.

item.title: Stormy Daniels' Husband: Big Weight Off Her Shoulders
item.description: Barrett Blade, the fourth husband of porn actor Stormy Daniels, said Thursday that former President Donald Trump's conviction in New York is "a big weight off her shoulders" and that she feels "vindicated."
